testsuite.name: Computhink.Script.My_Preferences_Download_Allfiles
testsuite.system-out: Scenario 01: Log into a EWA Enter valid user name into username field UserName Details: Dipak Enter valid password into password field Select a Room Selected Room name: demoserver.demoroom Captcha is not present, proceeding with login. Click Login button Session for user is already active. Do you want to create a new session? Dialog box displayed. User clicks OK button. Session message did not appear. Proceeding with login. User has logged in successfully

Test Scenario 1 : Verifying Download All Files Scenario 01: Log into a EWA Enter valid user name into username field Click on Refresh button Click on Username option Click on Logout option Timeout waiting for alert to appear. Scenario 01: Log into EWA Enter valid user name into username field UserName Details: admin Enter valid password into password field Select a Room Selected Room name: demoserver.demoroom Captcha is not present, proceeding with login. Click Login button Session message did not appear. Proceeding with login. Session message did not appear. Proceeding with login. Click on Setting Icon Click on Admin preferences Enter all valid file type for downlod file Click on Apply button Click on Username option Click on Logout option Timeout waiting for alert to appear. Scenario 01: Log into a EWA Enter valid user name into username field UserName Details: Dipak Enter valid password into password field Select a Room Selected Room name: demoserver.demoroom Captcha is not present, proceeding with login. Click Login button Session message did not appear. Proceeding with login. Session message did not appear. Proceeding with login. Click on Refresh button Click on Setting Icon Click on My Preferences Option Check Download all file checkbox Click on Apply button Click on Search Tab Enter Document Name Click on Find button Select and Open Document page Click on Download Menu Option All files should be Downloaded successfully Click on Username option Click on Logout option Timeout waiting for alert to appear.
